animation

Class TowerAnimation

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.scene.Node
      • animation.TowerAnimation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget

    public class TowerAnimation
extends javafx.scene.Node
    Purpose: TowerAnimation for usage with tower Entity types. 
     Visual animation and Projectile creation for tower Entities.
    Author:
    Hualiang Qin, Louis Galluzzi, Clinton Kral, John Stockey

    • Constructor Detail

      • TowerAnimation

        public TowerAnimation(javafx.scene.layout.StackPane stage,
                      int y,
                      double speed,
                      java.lang.String mode,
                      java.lang.String action,
                      int count,
                      int x,
                      int weaponFrames)
        Purpose: Constructs a new tower animation based on the passed in parameters.
        Parameters:
        stage - A StackPane for showing the animation.
        y - An int of the row position.
        speed - A double for the speed of the projectile.
        mode - A String of the mode to animate in.
        action - A String of the animation to build and show.
        count - An int of the number of frames for the general animation.
        x - An int of the column position.
        weaponFrames - An int of the number of frames for the projectile animation.

        public Projectile spawnProjectile(Entity target,
                                  int hitsLeft)
        Purpose: Spawns a projectile and pairs it to the target.
        Parameters:
        target - An Entity that the projectile will hit.
        hitsLeft - An int of the number of hits the projectile has left.
        Returns:
        Projectile of the projectile object.
